title: The End Of An Era

replies.body: is there something in the lore about these champs knowing each other? or did u just write this because u wanted to xD

Morgana and Kayle are sisters. I just played withe the idea of the random Champion spawning in the game. So that each champion. Regardless of loyalties. Know who each other are and I would assume they would have built friendships. Even having to fight as allies. So I played a little bit LOOSELY on Morgana's lore and back story. Yet had Leona as a friend as I feel they would have been friends. The two champs don't know each other lore wise. So I tried to fuse the lore and game together loosely.
So does that mean Kayle and Diana are friends? I ship this.
